title: Computer Vision
description: Introduction to the concepts of 2D and 3D computer vision: low-level image processing methods such as filtering and edge detection; feature extraction; segmentation and clustering; stereo vision; appearance-based and model-based algorithms. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as CPE/EEÂ 428.
prerequisites: EE 328 or CPE/CSC 357 or ME 305 or consent of instructor
